official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require that contracts and agreements respecting credit transactions subject to the Act be written in clear and understandable language.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require that contracts and agreements with regard to consumer credit transactions be written in clear and understandable language.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require that contracts and agreements respecting credit transactions subject to the Act be written in clear and understandable language.
